body: When I firts saw the cover I thought "Wow, this is so weird  I've gotta read this" expecting one of those yaoi incest fanfics from wattpad, I have no problems with yaoi and I had a phase where I read so much of those, even with that the sex scenes made me feels a little bit unconfortable because Im a fan of the franchise but kinda cute tho, I don't hate it I think the idea of Vergil and Dante learning how to live together and be closer is so wholesome, and even when I didn't play 5 for now I know they ended up good and now Vergil is good guy.. Kinda, but this is something more, I kinda like ngl

This would have been so wholesome without all that gay sex. (also why are they so poor? with all that inhuman strength they could work a few jobs unfit for normal humans and make a lot of money. construction work would be easy for them. could probably build a nice house together in less then a week).
LOL YOUR UNCLE AND DAD ARE FAGS NERO
